ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Get Location Settings
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Get Location Settings
ActivityMetadata.Description: Get information on meeting or alert settings applied to Zoom Rooms located in a specific location. By default, only **Meeting Settings** are returned. To view only **Alert Settings**, specify `alert` as the value of the `setting_type` query parameter. **Prerequisites:** * Zoom Room licenses * Owner or Admin privileges on the Zoom Account. **Scopes:** `room:read:admin`
